channel.title: Habits on Andrey Akinshin
channel.description: Recent content in Habits on Andrey Akinshin

item.title: 52 Small Changes for the Mind
item.description: Highly not recommended. 52 simple tips, wrapped in pathos and radical form. Advise like “Be friends with people” or “Conquer your inner demons”.

item.title: Atomic Habits: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones
item.description: The only pragmatic book on habits.

item.title: Tiny Habits: The Small Changes that Change Everything
